title: Ore No Vaccine Dake Ga Zonbi-Ka Shita Sekai O Sukueru
alternative_title: 俺のワクチンだけがゾンビ化した世界を救える ; Only my vaccine can save the world from zombie apocalypse
status: 俺のワクチンだけがゾンビ化した世界を救える ; Only my vaccine can save the world from zombie apocalypse
description:
Description :
        Oikawa Yuu, who has been shut up in his house, is certain to die as a virgin at the age of 21. This is because the whole world has become a place filled with zombies... One day, a survivor visits Yuu's house. The woman, who calls herself Sunny, injects Yuu with a vaccine that may save the world from the zombies... but as a result, Yuu gains the ability to turn zombies back into humans by having sex...?

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 4: Gals Who Are Kind To Introverts Do Exist
Chapter 1: Aishu Sunny Is At Her Limit
